this is nextjs 16 with shadcn components app for data analytics dashboard

- for displaying data you use [data-table](../components/ui/data-table.tsx)
(read the docs before using) https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/data-table with paginations, filters and ordering
- for parsing data we use paparse https://www.papaparse.com/docs
- for charts recharts
